video.title: Alphas
video.synopsis: A team of individuals gifted with extraordinary neurological abilities is tasked with solving complex crimes committed by outlaws with similar gifts.

episodes.synopsis: Dr. Lee Rosen and his team of Alphas investigate an implausible murder at the behest of the Department of Defense.
episodes.title: Pilot

episodes.synopsis: When a former patient of Dr. Rosen's escapes, Rosen is forced to examine the tenuous relationship between Alphas and the government.
episodes.title: Cause and Effect

episodes.synopsis: Dr. Rosen's team of Alphas relocates to new offices in Queens after the attack on his life while investigating the cause of a series of violent riots.
episodes.title: Anger Management

episodes.synopsis: Moving in on a Red Flag stronghold, Dr. Rosen and his team encounter a group of Alphas plotting a large-scale terrorist attack.
episodes.title: Rosetta

episodes.synopsis: The team's first case as new members of the Defense Criminal Investigation Service takes them to an outbreak of sudden deaths involving a high school.
episodes.title: Never Let Me Go

episodes.synopsis: After Gary ends up in jail and Harke bails him out, they stumble upon an active FBI case concerning the kidnapping of a wealthy university student.
episodes.title: Bill and Gary's Excellent Adventure

episodes.synopsis: Dr. Rosen and the Alphas team must track down and protect Skylar, an Alpha and technology whiz with a penchant for dangerous inventions.
episodes.title: Catch and Release

episodes.synopsis: Hicks and Nina fall under the spell of Jonas, an Alpha and charismatic cult leader who is willing to lead his followers to their deaths.
episodes.title: A Short Time in Paradise

episodes.synopsis: The team finds itself under siege by an undetectable Alpha.
episodes.title: Blind Spot

episodes.synopsis: When a member of the team is suspected of being an agent for Red Flag, Dr. Rosen and the Alphas are taken hostage until the traitor is revealed.
episodes.title: The Unusual Suspects

episodes.synopsis: Dr. Rosen and his team must decide who to trust when Red Flag, led by Stanton Parish, escalates the war on the Department of Defense.
episodes.title: Original Sin

episodes.synopsis: After Rosen revealed the existence of Alphas, his team was disbanded. But when two of their own are taken hostage, the team reunites to save them.
episodes.title: Wake-Up Call

episodes.synopsis: On the hunt for a killer with super-speed, our team realizes his own search has lead him directly to them, with deadly consequences.
episodes.title: The Quick and the Dead

episodes.synopsis: An investigation leads Harken and Hicks to a secret Alphas-only Fight Club where they meet "Kat," an energetic Alpha who can memorize any skill.
episodes.title: Alpha Dogs

episodes.synopsis: The team investigates an Alpha-related crime spree leading to one of their own, who is in the midst of a dangerous emotional breakdown.
episodes.title: When Push Comes To Shove

episodes.synopsis: An Alpha seems to have lost his mind and is attacking people at a hospital. While the team tracks him down, they begin to lose touch with reality.
episodes.title: Gaslight

episodes.synopsis: Rosen enlists tech whiz Skylar to help to discover the purpose of an Alpha-enhancing technology, but Rosen's zeal endangers Skylar and her daughter.
episodes.title: Alphaville

episodes.synopsis: The Alpha team comes face-to-face with further evidence of Parish's evil agenda.
episodes.title: Gods and Monsters

episodes.synopsis: Now that Rosen has discovered the identity of the mole, he must face down the nearly impossible choice of what to do next.
episodes.title: Falling

episodes.synopsis: When Hicks defects and works for Parish, Rosen and the team can only wonder: Has Hicks truly turned, or is he playing a deeper game involving Dani?
episodes.title: The Devil Will Drag You Under

episodes.synopsis: How does one grieve and move on from a terrible loss? A teammate's death at the hands of Parish leaves Rosen and the crew grasping for lifelines.
episodes.title: Life After Death

episodes.synopsis: Hicks and Kat transport a valuable Parish asset: a babbling memory sponge named Roland, who may have the strategic intel they need to stop Parish.
episodes.title: If Memory Serves

episodes.synopsis: When Rose kidnaps and interrogates an Alpha prisoner, the team wonders how far Rosen will go in seeking revenge for the death of his daughter.
episodes.title: Need to Know

episodes.synopsis: Separated from the team and haunted by vivid hallucinations, an injured and desperate Dr. Rosen seeks a final confrontation with Alpha leader Parish.
episodes.title: God's Eye
